para.para: A list of metrics associated with the OVS service.

entry.screen: service=networking resource_id component=ovs router_name port_id

row.entry: Inbound bytes per second for the router (if network_use_bits is false)

entry.screen: service=networking resource_id tenant_id component=ovs router_name port_id

row.entry: Incoming packets per second for the router

row.entry: Outgoing bytes per second for the router (if network_use_bits is false)
